org.apache.kafka.streams

Class StreamsConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.kafka.common.config.AbstractConfig
      • org.apache.kafka.streams.StreamsConfig

  • public class StreamsConfig
extends AbstractConfig
    Configuration for a KafkaStreams instance. Can also be use to configure the Kafka Streams internal KafkaConsumer and KafkaProducer. To avoid consumer/producer property conflicts, you should prefix those properties using consumerPrefix(String) and producerPrefix(String), respectively.

    Example: 

    // potentially wrong: sets "metadata.max.age.ms" to 1 minute for producer AND consumer
 Properties streamsProperties = new Properties();
 streamsProperties.put(ConsumerConfig.METADATA_MAX_AGE_CONFIG, 60000);
 // or
 streamsProperties.put(ProducerConfig.METADATA_MAX_AGE_CONFIG, 60000);

 // suggested:
 Properties streamsProperties = new Properties();
 // sets "metadata.max.age.ms" to 1 minute for consumer only
 streamsProperties.put(StreamsConfig.consumerPrefix(ConsumerConfig.METADATA_MAX_AGE_CONFIG), 60000);
 // sets "metadata.max.age.ms" to 1 minute for producer only
 streamsProperties.put(StreamsConfig.producerPrefix(ProducerConfig.METADATA_MAX_AGE_CONFIG), 60000);

 StreamsConfig streamsConfig = new StreamsConfig(streamsProperties);
    Kafka Streams required to set at least properties "application.id" and "bootstrap.servers". Furthermore, it is not allowed to enable "enable.auto.commit" that is disabled by Kafka Streams by default.
    See Also:
    KafkaStreams.KafkaStreams(org.apache.kafka.streams.processor.TopologyBuilder, StreamsConfig), ConsumerConfig, ProducerConfig

      • CONSUMER_PREFIX

        public static final String CONSUMER_PREFIX
        Prefix used to isolate consumer configs from producer configs. It is recommended to use consumerPrefix(String) to add this prefix to consumer properties.

    • Method Detail

      • consumerPrefix

        public static String consumerPrefix(String consumerProp)
        Prefix a property with CONSUMER_PREFIX. This is used to isolate consumer configs from producer configs.
        Parameters:
        consumerProp - the consumer property to be masked
        Returns:
        CONSUMER_PREFIX + consumerProp

      • producerPrefix

        public static String producerPrefix(String producerProp)
        Prefix a property with PRODUCER_PREFIX. This is used to isolate producer configs from consumer configs.
        Parameters:
        producerProp - the producer property to be masked
        Returns:
        PRODUCER_PREFIX + producerProp

      • configDef

        public static ConfigDef configDef()
        Return a copy of the config definition.
        Returns:
        a copy of the config definition

      • getConsumerConfigs

        public Map<String,Object> getConsumerConfigs(StreamThread streamThread,
                                    String groupId,
                                    String clientId)
                                      throws ConfigException
        Get the configs to the consumer. Properties using the prefix CONSUMER_PREFIX will be used in favor over their non-prefixed versions except in the case of ConsumerConfig.BOOTSTRAP_SERVERS_CONFIG where we always use the non-prefixed version as we only support reading/writing from/to the same Kafka Cluster.
        Parameters:
        streamThread - the StreamThread creating a consumer
        groupId - consumer groupId
        clientId - clientId
        Returns:
        Map of the consumer configuration.
        Throws:
        ConfigException - if "enable.auto.commit" was set to false by the user

      • getRestoreConsumerConfigs

        public Map<String,Object> getRestoreConsumerConfigs(String clientId)
                                             throws ConfigException
        Get the configs for the restore-consumer. Properties using the prefix CONSUMER_PREFIX will be used in favor over their non-prefixed versions except in the case of ConsumerConfig.BOOTSTRAP_SERVERS_CONFIG where we always use the non-prefixed version as we only support reading/writing from/to the same Kafka Cluster.
        Parameters:
        clientId - clientId
        Returns:
        Map of the consumer configuration.
        Throws:
        ConfigException - if "enable.auto.commit" was set to false by the user

      • getProducerConfigs

        public Map<String,Object> getProducerConfigs(String clientId)
        Get the configs for the producer. Properties using the prefix PRODUCER_PREFIX will be used in favor over their non-prefixed versions except in the case of ProducerConfig.BOOTSTRAP_SERVERS_CONFIG where we always use the non-prefixed version as we only support reading/writing from/to the same Kafka Cluster.
        Parameters:
        clientId - clientId
        Returns:
        Map of the producer configuration.
